analysis.txt:
S 1: The travel times can be met, because luckily the tunnel will be built. 

S 2: But that, I mean, that's not good. The environment will suffer. 

S1: That's true.

S3: It's doch sheer populism to claim that the nature will be harmed. 

S 1: But building the bridge is even more damaging. 

S2: You're right. So yes, it's good that the tunnel is built.
